docs.text: VBA Best Practices Description list of best practices and tips when developing VBA code Code Set Up Each VBA project should include Config Module this is where you will add you meta data for the project Config Module Example Public Const VERSION = "0.1.0" Public Const NAME = "Ish Hassan" Public Const EMAIL = "ihassan@example.com" Public Const DESCRIPTION = "<what does this vba solution do>" Public Const REPO = "<repo url>" 'any other config items e.g. ADO_FEATURE_NUMBER Main Module Utils (optional)
docs.title: homepage
